definition: Huailai county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Huailai County, Hebei province is a neighboring county to Beijing, the capital of China.
sentences.chinese: 河北懷來縣毗鄰首都北京，其生態環境退化嚴重。
